result.eng: I ate a fine meal there.
result.html: d'ith mé béile breá annI ate a fine meal there.
result.ponchtml: d'iṫ mé béile breá annI ate a fine meal there.

result.ga: d'ith mé pónairí le haghaidh bricfeasta
result.orig: d'ith mé pónairí le haghaidh bricfeasta
result.html: d'ith mé pónairí le haghaidh bricfeastaI ate beans for breakfast.
result.ponchtml: d'iṫ mé pónairí le haġaiḋ bricfeastaI ate beans for breakfast.

result.eng: I must have met them once or twice because we ate in the same restaurants.
result.ga: caithfidh gur bhuail mé leo uair nó dhó ó d'ith muid sna bialanna céanna
result.orig: caithfidh gur bhuail mé leo uair nó dhó ó d'ith muid sna bialanna céanna

result.ponchtml: caiṫfiḋ gur ḃuail mé leo uair nó ḋó ó d'iṫ muid sna bialanna céannaI must have met them once or twice because we ate in the same restaurants.

result.eng: He ate it up from his hand.
